title: Kona: Day One (Patch 2.2.0.4) (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "patch_kona_day_one_2.2.0.4.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Change log:
Lighting | Fixed overlit indoor scenes
Mouse | Fixed issues with losing cursor
Keyboard | Azerty option for keyboard is now supported
Graphic | Added "Crappy" graphic settings
Graphic | Added "Sharpen" setting for Mr. 4K :)
